name: Equipment
description: A list of all the filtered items.

methods.name: Item
methods.description: Performs the Item operation.

methods.name: EquipmentSlot
methods.description: Gets the EquipmentSlot for a given item filter

methods.name: WidgetChild
methods.description: Gets the WidgetChild for the EquipmentSlot given

methods.name: widgetParentId
methods.description: Gets the ID of the parent Widget for the Equipment Interface

methods.name: widgetChildId
methods.description: Gets the child ID of the WidgetChild for the equipment interface

methods.name: capacity
methods.description: Gets the capacity for the equipment interface

methods.name: all
methods.description: A list of all the filtered items.

methods.name: isLoaded
methods.description: Checks if the internal equipment tables have been loaded Used primarily for ItemEventManagers

methods.name: equip
methods.signature: public static boolean equip​(@NonNull EquipmentSlot slot, java.lang.Integer... ids)
methods.description: Equips the first item that matches one of the given IDs in the slot provided

methods.name: getSlotForItem
methods.signature: public static @Nullable EquipmentSlot getSlotForItem​(@NonNull Filter<Item> filter)
methods.description: Gets the EquipmentSlot for a given item filter

methods.name: unequip
methods.signature: public static boolean unequip​(@NonNull EquipmentSlot slot)
methods.description: Unequips the equipment from the equipment slot

methods.name: open
methods.description: Opens the equipment tab

methods.name: interact
methods.signature: public static boolean interact​(@NonNull EquipmentSlot slot, @Nullable java.lang.String action)
methods.description: Interacts with the slot specified with the action specified Opens the Tab.EQUIPMENT tab if needed

methods.name: getWidgetForSlot
methods.signature: public static @Nullable WidgetChild getWidgetForSlot​(@NonNull EquipmentSlot slot)
methods.description: Gets the WidgetChild for the EquipmentSlot given

methods.name: getSlotBounds
methods.signature: public static @Nullable java.awt.Rectangle getSlotBounds​(@NonNull EquipmentSlot slot)
methods.description: Gets the rectangular bounds of the WidgetChild for the given EquipmentSlot

methods.name: fullSlotCount
methods.description: Gets the number of slots that contains items

methods.name: emptySlotCount
methods.description: Gets the number of slots that do not contain items

methods.name: isSlotEmpty
methods.description: Checks if the given slot is empty Uses the values from EquipmentSlot.getSlot()

methods.name: isSlotFull
methods.description: Checks if the slot has an Item in it slot is based on EquipmentSlot.getSlot()

methods.name: onlyContains
methods.description: Checks if your equipment only contains items with specified names

methods.name: slotContains
methods.signature: public static boolean slotContains​(int slot, java.lang.String... names)
methods.description: Checks if the slot contains any items that match the given names. slot is based on EquipmentSlot.getSlot()

methods.name: slotNameContains
methods.signature: @Deprecated public static boolean slotNameContains​(int slot, @NonNull java.lang.String sub)
methods.description: see slotContains(int, String)

methods.name: getFirstEmptySlot
methods.description: Gets the first empty slot in your equipment.

methods.name: getFirstFullSlot
methods.description: Gets the next full slot in your equipment

methods.name: getIdForSlot
methods.description: Gets the Id of the Item in the slot. slot based on EquipmentSlot.getSlot()

methods.name: getNameForSlot
methods.description: Gets the Name for the Item in the slot. slot based on EquipmentSlot.getSlot()

methods.name: slot
methods.description: Gets the slot for the item with specified ID.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Performs the add operation.

methods.name: toArray
methods.description: Performs the toArray operation.

methods.name: getItemInSlot
methods.description: Gets item in specified slot. slot based on EquipmentSlot.getSlot()

methods.name: get
methods.description: Get item for specified name.

methods.name: except
methods.signature: public static @NonNull java.util.List<@NonNull Item> except​(@NonNull Filter<Item> filter)
methods.description: Get all items which do not fit the given criteria.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Performs the size operation.

methods.name: isEmpty
methods.description: Checks if empty.

methods.name: contains
methods.description: Contains boolean.

methods.name: containsAll
methods.description: Checks if your equipment contains all of the items with names specified

methods.name: isFull
methods.description: Determines if equipment full.

methods.name: count
methods.description: Count of all the items that match the search.

methods.name: set
methods.signature: public static @Nullable Item set​(int index, Item element)
methods.description: Sets the .

methods.name: isOpen
methods.description: Checks if open.
